description: The Louisa Flowering Crab is an amazing plant! Boasting an abundance of stunning springtime blooms in hues of pink and white, it is sure to bring the perfect dose of color to any garden. Not only are the blooms long-lasting, but theyâ€™re also extremely fragrant; a slight breeze will draw in delightful sweet aromas. After its petals fade, this tree produces a plentiful crop of shiny red apples that can be used in baking or enjoyed fresh. Hardy and versatile, the Louisa Flowering Crab is perfect for anyone looking for an easy-care addition to their landscape!
